p.d: Satbir feels totally at home in the canton of Berne, having fled India, his native country, thirty years earlier. His son, Benjamin, wants to get to know his father's country and accompanies him in this epic journey to the Punjab, northern India. Together they share a voyage filled with emotion. Directed by: Adrian Schmon, Olivier Roth, Karen Ballmer (season 1, Switzerland, 2018)
